column4: Is it just me or is anyone else annoyed at the things ubuntu changes for the user. Why can't I change the GDM theme in Karmic?
So why does Canoical insist on forcing changes on us?
I'm being turned off by linux as a whole.  I started checking out FreeBSD and it's a little bit refreshing
I think I'm going to go to Fedora (when 12 comes out) or back to Debian
